##Welcome! The purpose of this page is to provide resources for our workshop series about using  Rstudio and R::packages. 

* Workshop Series
    + [Session 1](http://jmhulbert.github.io/R/S1) Introduction to RStudio.
    + [Session 2](http://jmhulbert.github.io/R/S2) Introduction to data visulization with ggplot2.
    + [Session 3](http://jmhulbert.github.io/R/S3) Introduction to data transformation with dplyr.
    + [Session 4](http://jmhulbert.github.io/R/S4) Introduction to multivariate analysis with vegan.
    + [Session 5](http://jmhulbert.github.io/R/S5) Introduction to R markdown.
